tool.name: WordShape Annotator
tool.description: add a shape feature to tokens with
tool.help:
WordShape Annotator =====================================
**What it does**
Adds shape features to each Token. Feature values are:
* lower * upper * mixed * capitalized * punct
**Required annotations**
#. `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token>`_
**Generated Annotations**
#. `Token#shape <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token#shape>`_
